Trigger.name: Copper
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Directing the energy of copper, (you) send myriad russet streams towards (.+), shattering \w+ shield\.$
^(\w+) sends myriad russet streams towards (.+), shattering \w+ shield\.$
^Directing the energy of copper, (you) send myriad russet streams towards (.+), which whip around \w+ ineffectually\.$
